readable.title: 2337757064_08c4033824
readable.content: A fisherman in a field near a lake . A person in a yellow hat , carrying a bag and a fishing pole , walks in a grassy area near a small body of water . A person in a yellow hat is walking across the grass carrying a long pole . A person with a yellow hat holding a fishing pole in the grass by water Man holding stick in field of green grass .
